Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provided me with constructive feedback and areas which I could actually improve in, whereas teachers have only given vague and lack of guidance answers.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback allowed me to harness my strengths and improve on my weaknesses whereas my teachers made me feel like even though I did my best I can not do more than the grade the give me.
